name: redrawjs
description: 基于传统视图，VM视图框架。并且支持SEO优化解决方案。

scripts.copyfile: mkdir -p build && cp -r package.json README.md LICENSE .npmignore build/
scripts.release: npm run copyfile && cd build/ && npm publish
scripts.patch: rm -rf build && npm version patch && npm run release

author: Rocky Wu <wjl19890427@hotmail.com>
